mapper.select: SELECT p.protector_name AS protectorName, a.animal_name AS animalName, (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - DATE_FORMAT(a.animal_age, '%Y')) AS animalAge, a.animal_type AS animalType, a.animal_gender AS animalGender, a.animal_weight AS animalWeight, a.animal_important_symptom AS animalImportantSymptom from animal AS a Join protector AS p ON a.seq_protector = p.seq_protector where seq_doctor = 1
